title: Forbidden
description: From a distant thrown, a ruthless King strikes fear into the hearts of men. With a never ending war raging, one that forces the people into darkness, a warrior finds the courage to break free.Jax, determined to escape the King's twisted games, ventures into a world that he could never prepare for. A world where pleasure and pain collide. Now nothing will ever be the same...
author: J.V.K.
